product_name: Teva Fuse-Ion Mesh Water Shoes - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Teva Fuse-Ion Mesh women's shoes go from your water sport of choice to your favorite gathering spot afterwards. Grippy soles hold fast to slippery surfaces and the synthetic mesh uppers dry quickly. Flat rubber outsoles offer good grip on wet rocks and slippery ramps. Synthetic mesh/textile uppers breathe well and dry quickly; mesh interiors pull moisture away from feet to help keep them dry and comfortable. Collapsible heels give you the option of slipping in and out quickly; soft elastic binding around the openings won't irritate your skin. Closeout.
short_description: Teva Fuse-Ion Mesh women's shoes go from your water sport of choice to your favorite gathering spot afterwards. Grippy soles hold fast to slippery surfaces and the synthetic mesh uppers dry quickly.
